    <html>
        <head>
            <title></title>
        </head>
        <body>
            <h1 id="header">This is title!</h1>
            <script>
                var oHeader = document.getElementById("header");var oHeader = document.getElementById("header");
                alert(oHeader.innerHTML);
            </script>
        </body>
    </html>
//这是一个注释

var header  = document.getElementById('oHeader');
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html>

<head>

    <style>

        p { margin:8px; font-size:20px; color:blue;

            cursor:pointer; }

        b { text-decoration:underline; }

    </style>

    <script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-latest.js"></script>

</head>

<body>
<!--这是一个注释-->
<p>

    <b>Click</b> to change the <span id="tag">html</span>

</p>
</body>
</html>
/*这个是注释*/
body, ul, li, div, a, h1, h2, h3 { margin: 0; padding: 0; }
li { list-style-type: none; }
a { text-decoration: none; }
a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
